dec:processunit.name: Change Point Segmentation
dec:processunit.description: GPS tracks will be segmented by change point.

property.name: Velocity Bound
property.description: Specifies a loose upper bound for the velocity value of a point to declare the point as (non) walking.

property.name: Acceleration Bound
property.description: Specifies a loose upper bound for the acceleration value of a point to declare point as (non) wakling

property.name: Certain Length Threshold
property.description: Specifies the length that each segment must exceed to be declared certain.

property.name: Unchertain Count Threshold
property.description: Specifies how many successive uncertain segments needs to be to declare uncertain segments as one non-wakling segment

property.name: Minimal Distance Bound
property.description: Specifies the minimal length of an segment with consecutive (non) walking points must exceed if not it will be merged with the backward segment.

property.name: Minimal Time Difference
property.description: Specifies the duration time of an segment with consecutive (non) walking points must exceed
